name: Kevin Plunder
text: Tamed Beast — Response: After you change to this form, remove up to 3 savage counters from Zabu. Heal 1 damage from Kevin Plunder for each savage counter removed this way.

flavor: “The time has come for them to face the wrath of Ka-Zar! For none may break the jungle law!”
name: Ka-Zar
text: The Call Of The Wild — Action: Spend 1 resource of any type → ready Ka-Zar or Zabu. (Limit once per round.)

name: Zabu
text: Permanent. Setup. Action: Exhaust Zabu → place 3 savage counters here. Hero Interrupt: When you use one of your basic powers, exhaust Zabu and remove 1 savage counter from it → get +2 to that power for this use.

flavor: “Just watching your back, dear ... as usual.”
name: Shanna the She-Devil
text: Response: After Shanna the She-Devil enters play, ready a [[Savage Land]] card in play.

name: Stalk
text: Action: Look at the top card of the encounter deck (top 2 cards instead if you exhaust Zabu and remove 1 savage counter from it). Discard any number of those, then place the rest on the top and/or bottom of the encounter deck in any order.

name: Ambush
text: Hero Interrupt (attack/defense): When you would take any amount of damage, prevent 3 of that damage. Deal 1 damage to an enemy. You may exhaust Zabu and remove 1 savage counter from it to deal 1 damage to an enemy and draw 1 card.

flavor: “Stronger than a mastodon! Stronger than a giant boar! Mighty is Ka-Zar, lord of the jungle!” - Ka-Zar
name: Swing Into Action
text: Action: Ready Ka-Zar and Zabu. Ka-Zar gains AERIAL until the end of the phase.

flavor: “None can hide from the lord of the jungle!”
name: Pack Hunting
text: Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. You may exhaust Zabu and remove 1 savage counter from it to remove 1 additional threat from that scheme and confuse an enemy.

name: Pounce
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. Choose a player. You may exhaust Zabu and remove 1 savage counter from it to deal 2 damage to the villain and 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

name: Hut, Sweet Hut
text: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Hut, Sweet Hut → look at the top 5 cards of your deck and add one of those to your hand (you may exhaust Zabu to add 2 cards instead). Shuffle the rest back into your deck. Then, discard 1 card from your hand.

name: Feeding Time
text: Forced Response (Hero): After 1 savage counter is removed from Zabu, place 1 hunger counter here. Action: Exhaust this card and remove 3 hunger counters from it → ready Zabu.

name: Beastmaster
text: Hero Action: Choose a basic power and exhaust Beastmaster → get +1 to that power until the end of the round. Hero Response: After you ready Zabu, ready this card.
